    Assistant
    There are ten assistant cards for each wizard, if possible equal cards can't be used in the same turn

    This class represents the Bag which contains the students that are not assigned to an Island, Cloud or Board.

    The class represent the player board in the game.

    This class represent the Clouds in the game.

    FactionColor
    This class is used to identify different teams for students and professors
    GameManager
    External class of model used to control everything and make every possible action
    Island
    At the beginning of the game there are twelve islands, they can have students on them and tower which represents that a player is controlling them.

    This class is used to store some information about towers and their use, this class is used in the Board one to manage towers

    This class represents the in-game player
    PlayerTest
    Unit test for Player class.
    TowerColor
    In matches with two or three players each player control towers with a specific color, 'NONE' is used where a tower hasn't been set yet

    This class represents an object of the model that could be modified by an action.

    This defines possible type of exportable objects and their key for hashmaps constructions
    WizardTeam
    This enumeration represents possible teams for each of the four wizard: every wizard has a different team
